snippet: His three reality shows on Fox rank in the Top 10 of all summer programs in the 18-to-49-year-old demographic, the age group most coveted by advertisers.
abstract: His three reality shows on Fox rank in the Top 10 of all summer programs in the 18-to-49-year-old demographic, the age group most coveted by advertisers.

headline.main: Ratings Gold for Gordon Ramsay's Reality Empire
